help.title: Help
help.gettingStartedText:
1. Create a new diagram from the sidebar
2. Drag and drop elements from the toolbar
3. Connect elements by clicking and dragging
4. Use the AI assistant to modify your diagram
help.elementsText:
• Start Event: Beginning of a process
• End Event: End of a process
• Task: A single activity
• Gateway: Decision point in the process
• Pool: Container for process participants
help.aiAssistantText: Use natural language to describe changes to your diagram. The AI will automatically modify your diagram based on your instructions.
